title: pankaja mukhiyarellaru
sahitya:
pankaja mukhiyarellaru bandu laksmI vEnkaTaramaNagAradi ettire


caraNam 1    matsyAvatArage mandarOddhArage accariyinda bhUmi tandavage 
heccAda ukkina kambhadindali banda lakSmI narasimhagAradi yettire
    caraNam 2    vAmana rUpili dAna bEDidavage prEmadi koDaliya piDidavage 
rAmacandranAgi dasha shirananu konda svAmi shrI krSNagArati yettire
    caraNam 3    battali nintage bauddhAvatArage uttama ashvanEridage 
bhaktara salahuva purandara viTTlage muttaideyarAti yettire
